name: Health Potion
description: A vial of shimmering red liquid that smells of cherries and mint.
lore: Brewed by the hedge-witches of the Glimmerwood, these potions are a common sight in any adventurer's pack.

name: Mana Potion
description: A swirling, deep blue potion that feels cool to the touch.
lore: Distilled from the essence of captured starlight, it is said to taste like a cool night's sky.

name: Goblin Ear
description: A grotesque, leathery trophy taken from a defeated goblin. It smells awful.
lore: Some merchants collect these for... reasons best left unspoken.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic, but reliable, iron longsword. The hilt is wrapped in worn leather.
lore: The standard-issue weapon for the Royal Guard of Eldoria before the kingdom fell.

name: Leather Armor
description: Simple, sturdy armor made from boiled and hardened leather plates.
lore: Crafted by the dozen in the tanneries of the Free Cities. It offers basic protection against claws and blades.

name: Gold Coin
description: A shiny gold coin, stamped with the visage of a forgotten king.
lore: A rare sight these days, harkening back to a more prosperous era.

name: Silver Coin
lore: The most common currency for trade between towns.

name: Copper Coin
lore: Barely enough to buy a loaf of stale bread.

name: Mysterious Key
description: A strange, ornate key that seems to hum with a faint, magical energy. It doesn't seem to fit any normal lock.
lore: Its origins are a mystery, but you feel a sense of destiny connected to it.

name: Old Map
description: A faded piece of parchment with cryptic markings and a large 'X' drawn in what looks like dried blood.
lore: The legendary map of the pirate One-Eyed Jack. Many have sought his treasure, but none have returned.
